description: A collection of circles in a semi-circular formation with the straight edge in the top left corner of the picture; there is a thin line of circles extending outwards from the center of the straight edge. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a light green triangle along the straight edge of the formation in the center and a lighter, more yellowish-green triangle in the bottom right corner.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
